name: Composition Btn list
description: Shows progress towards a total goal, broken down by its individual components. Ideal for displaying data usage, budget tracking, or project milestones.
examples: Show my data usage for this month.
How much is left in my monthly budget?
What's the progress on the Q3 project?

component_title.description: A brief title for the component (e.g., 'Data Usage', 'Monthly Budget').

target_label.description: The unit or label for the overall target (e.g., 'GB', '%', '$').

text_list.description: A list of items that make up the total target. Recommended 1-5 items.

list_content.description: The name of the individual item (e.g., 'Video Streaming').

list_goal.description: The target value for the individual item, including its unit (e.g., '10 GB').

list_now.description: The current value or progress for the individual item (numeric).

text_cta.description: The label for the Call-to-Action button (e.g., 'View Details').

html:
{{ data.component_title }}

{{ data.text_target }}

{{ data.target_label }} left

{{ item.list_content }}

{{ item.list_now }} / {{ item.list_goal }}
